title: Quiz - Introduction et Verbe 'To Be'
description: Quiz de révision sur les présentations et les formes de base du verbe 'To Be'

questions.question: Which is the correct way to introduce yourself?
questions.explanation: 'My name is...' is the correct structure for introductions.

questions.question: How do you respond to 'How are you?'
questions.explanation: 'I am fine, thank you' is the standard polite response.

questions.question: Which contraction is correct?
questions.explanation: 'I'm' is the correct contraction of 'I am'.
